name: Makhfy || مخفي
description:
2D platformer where you deceive your enemies by being invisible

----------------

Controls:

A and D keys to move

J to jump 

L to hide 

escape to pause game

Enter to change dialogue 

---------------------

Recourses :

Music:

  1. "Professor and the Plant" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
  2. "Aquarium" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) main menu
  3. Not As It Seems" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) game music
  4. "Eastern Thought" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) game music

SFX built in Inshot (bought)

Font: https://www.fontspace.com/bluetea-font-f83701
